header.note: Google places strick character limits on the various text fields in Google Play. The title is 30 characters, the short description is 80 characters, and the rest of the strings, which all go together in the description, are limited to 4000 characters.

trans-unit.source: OONI Probe
trans-unit.note: This is limited by Google to 30 characters

trans-unit.source: Measure Internet Censorship, Speed & Performance
trans-unit.target: Mældu ritskoðun internetsins, hraða þess og afköst
trans-unit.note: This is limited by Google to 80 characters

trans-unit.source: OONI Probe - Measure Internet Censorship & Speed
trans-unit.target: OONI Probe - Mældu ritskoðun internetsins & hraða þess
trans-unit.note: This is limited by Apple to 50 characters

trans-unit.source: Measure Internet Censorship
trans-unit.note: This is limited by Apple to 30 characters

trans-unit.source: Collect evidence of internet censorship. Measure the speed and performance of your network.
trans-unit.target: Safnaðu vísbendingum um ritskoðun internetsins. Mældu hraða og afköst netkerfisins þíns.
trans-unit.note: This is limited by Apple to 170 characters

trans-unit.source: Are websites and social media apps blocked? Is your network unusually slow? Run OONI Probe to find out!
trans-unit.target: Er lokað á vefsvæði og samfélagsmiðla? Er nettengingin óvenjulega hægvirk? Keyrðu OONI Probe til að sjá hvað er í gangi!

trans-unit.source: With this app, you will examine the blocking of websites and instant messaging apps, measure your network's speed and performance, and check whether systems that could be responsible for censorship and surveillance are in your network.
OONI Probe is developed by the Open Observatory of Network Interference (OONI), a free software project (under The Tor Project) that aims to uncover internet censorship around the world.
Since 2012, OONI’s global community has collected millions of network measurements from more than 200 countries, shedding light on multiple cases of network interference.
By running OONI Probe, you can help increase transparency of internet censorship.
trans-unit.target: Með því að keyra OONI Probe geturðu hjálpað við að finna vísbendingar um ritskoðun internetsins.

trans-unit.source: Collect evidence of internet censorship
You can check whether and how websites and instant messaging apps are blocked. The network measurement data you will collect may serve as evidence of internet censorship.
Detect systems responsible for censorship and surveillance
trans-unit.target: Finndu kerfi sem standa fyrir ritskoðun og eftirliti

trans-unit.source: OONI Probe tests are also designed to uncover the presence of systems (middleboxes) that could be responsible for censorship and surveillance.
trans-unit.target: Prófanir OONI Probe eru einnig hannaðar til að fletta ofan af tilvist kerfa (millitölva) sem gætu borið ábyrgð á ritskoðun og eftirliti.

trans-unit.source: Measure the speed and performance of your network
trans-unit.target: Mældu hraða og afköst netkerfisins þíns

trans-unit.source: You can measure the speed and performance of your network by running OONI's implementation of the Network Diagnostic Test (NDT). You can also measure video streaming performance with the Dynamic Adaptive Streaming over HTTP (DASH) test.
Open data

OONI publishes network measurement data because open data allows third parties to verify OONI findings, conduct independent studies, and answer other research questions. Openly publishing OONI data also helps increase transparency of internet censorship around the world. You can explore and download OONI data here: https://ooni.io/data/
Free software

All OONI Probe tests (including our NDT and DASH implementations), are based on free and open source software. You can find OONI software projects on GitHub: https://github.com/ooni. Curious to learn how OONI Probe tests work? Learn more: https://ooni.io/nettest/
To receive updates from the OONI-verse, follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/OpenObservatory
trans-unit.target: Til að fá fréttir af því sem tengist OONI, geturðu fylgst með okkur á Twitter: https://twitter.com/OpenObservatory

trans-unit.source: Detect internet censorship and test your network's speed and performance
trans-unit.target: Mældu hvort internetsið sé ritskoðað og prófaðu hraða netkerfisins og afköst þess

trans-unit.source: Uncover evidence of internet censorship
Run a sophisticated network speed and diagnostics test
Easily discover which websites are blocked on your network
Testing your network is fun with a friendly octopus!
The Open Observatory of Network Interference (OONI) is a global observation network for detecting internet censorship and other forms of network interference around the world.
network,speedtest,measurement,net,wifi,networking,scan,bandwidth,bench,dns,mobile,ooni,research,tool
